mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attach (attach_id, con_key1, org_file_name,server_file_name,file_size, insert_dtm) VALUES ( attach_id_seq.nextval, #{con_key1}, #{org_file_name}, #{server_file_name}, #{file_size}, sysdate)
